body_html:
Hi, Well, I don't know if it can help but I could make it work with the following command:
bazel-bin/tensorflow/examples/label_image/label_image --output_layer=final_result --labels=/home/thales/data/fine_tuned_inception_on_flowers/output_labels.txt --image=/home/thales/data/flower_photos_processed/training_results/5547758_eea9edfd54_n.jpg --graph=/home/thales/data/fine_tuned_mobilenet_on_flowers/output_graph.pb --input_mean=-127 --input_std=127 --input_width=224 --input_height=224
The output_graph.pb is the one obtained with https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/image_retraining
I had to change a little the suggestion made by petewarden as the tensor MobilenetV1/Predictions/Reshape_1 could not be found.
At least, it works but I am still a little confused about these errors.
Regards,
Stephane

body:
Hi, Well, I don't know if it can help but I could make it work with the following command:
`bazel-bin/tensorflow/examples/label_image/label_image --output_layer=final_result --labels=/home/thales/data/fine_tuned_inception_on_flowers/output_labels.txt --image=/home/thales/data/flower_photos_processed/training_results/5547758_eea9edfd54_n.jpg --graph=/home/thales/data/fine_tuned_mobilenet_on_flowers/output_graph.pb --input_mean=-127 --input_std=127 --input_width=224 --input_height=224`
The output_graph.pb is the one obtained with [https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/image_retraining](url)
I had to change a little the suggestion made by petewarden as the tensor `MobilenetV1/Predictions/Reshape_1` could not be found.
At least, it works but I am still a little confused about these errors.
Regards,
Stephane
